channel.title: How do i make my website require mozilla firefox?
channel.description:
I want my site to require mozilla firefox. So when people go on my website (on internet explorer, opera, and others) a page comes up saying they have to have mozilla firefox to view the page. I have been seraching for awhile on how to do this but cant find anything.
How would i do this?

item.title: How do i make my website require mozilla firefox?
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

This is a server side example i just wrote…

<?php $browser = substr($_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'],0,11); if($browser != 'Mozilla/5.0') { die('Get Firefox idiot! -> http://www.getfirefox.com'); } ?>

your content

<?php } // end ?>

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my website require mozilla firefox?

item.title: How do i make my website require mozilla firefox?
item.dc:creator: @mprules mprules
item.description:
@mprules wrote:

Then you would have to make a error pop up…So you would prob use html for the cookie…and php for the command…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my website require mozilla firefox?

item.title: How do i make my website require mozilla firefox?
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

Sorry, I don’t know if this is a bump or not.
The following code should work too:

<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript">
function browserX(){
if (navigator.userAgent != "firefox"){
      history.go(-1);
      }
}
</script>

I did a script like this before.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my website require mozilla firefox?

item.description:

yah, and IE sucks. I got the default amount of ram for some computers today, 512 Mbytes, however I can hold up to(counts current tabs) 27 tabs and no lag what so ever, using 156,588K memory, so what, no lag, main hardrive has 310 gigs on it, I am good with FF, IE SUCKS!
